name: Unstable Spore
description:
Unstable spore for Ludum Dare 49. You need to kill the unstable spore with your cards. Spores have some unstable states and may act or change their position just when you move or attack!

This is a rouge-like game in which you need to face unstable enemy of spores and think about resources control. Spores has three states(normal,angry,weak). They could change their states or take action(move/duplicate) in any time. You need to kill the elite spore in every level by taking normal action and using special skill cards that cannot be used again in the whole game.

First time join in Ludum Dare. Beg your understand when finding some bugs or unsatisfied content.

You can contact with me by QQ:5540395 or bilibili page of 水水水水水门 (https://space.bilibili.com/95944199)
